import pandas as pd
import seaborn as sns
import yfinance as yf

# S&P 500 Index Stock
ticker1 = yf.Ticker("INX")
data1 = ticker1.history(period = "max")
data1 = data1.loc["2001-01-01":"2023-12-31"]
data1.to_csv("data/sp500_2001_2023.csv")
#print(data1.to_string())

# Schwab Index Stock
ticker2 = yf.Ticker("SWPPX")
data2 = ticker2.history(period = "max")
data2 = data2.loc["2001-01-01":"2023-12-31"]
data2.to_csv("data/swppx_2001_2023.csv")
